verbose_text: As shown in XREF_FIG, STZ induced diabetes reduced the expression of SIRT1 protein in the DM group (P < 0.05), compared with the age matched control group following I/R injury, whereas EGCG pre-treatment significantly increased SIRT1 expression compared to the DM group (P < 0.05) (XREF_FIG).
evidence: STZ-induced diabetes reduced the expression of SIRT1 protein in the DM group (P<0.05), compared with the age-matched control group following I/R injury
